metadata.title: CVE-2024-3035 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A permission check vulnerability in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versionsstarting from 8.12 prior to 17.0.6, 17.1 prior to 17.1.4, and 17.2 prior to17.2.2  allowed for LFS tokens to read and write to the user ownedrepositories.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
